name: 𝐿𝓊𝒸𝒾𝒹 𝐹𝒶𝓉𝑒
description:
LUCID FATE is a work-in-progress text-based novel heavily concentrating on facets such as romance, mystery, the familiar group adventure trope, multiple side confrontations, and some fight scenes here and there along with some delicious brain teasers.

You play an amnesiac trying to piece together the puzzles that seem to grow the more you try to solve. How far will it go- or how much can you find out yourself?

 You are enrolled in a perennial event, The Kabot Tournament along with other contestants to earn a high status in the kingdoms knighting scheme amongst other legendary Fighters. The regulations baffle you as rioting amongst other parties is tolerated and encouraged, and so are other aspects.

But you soon realize that this isn't just any typical tournament to the death that happens every year and it has more to do with you than you imagined.
